feed.title: Montreal River Harbour - Weather - Environment Canada

entry.title: WINTER STORM WARNING , Montreal River Harbour
entry.summary: Persons in or near this area should be on the lookout for adverse weather conditions and take necessary safety precautions. Issued: 3:48 PM EST Friday 23 December 2022

entry.title: Current Conditions: -10.9°C
entry.summary:
Observed at: Wawa Airport 10:00 PM EST Friday 23 December 2022
Temperature: -10.9°C
Pressure: 98.6 kPa
Humidity: 77 %

Wind: NNW 15 km/h gust 30 km/h
Air Quality Health Index: N/A

entry.title: Friday night: Snow and blowing snow. Low minus 12.
entry.summary: Snow and blowing snow. Amount 2 to 4 cm. Wind northwest 40 km/h gusting to 60. Low minus 12. Wind chill minus 16 this evening and minus 23 overnight. Forecast issued 4:00 PM EST Friday 23 December 2022
